wikipedia_page.main: Mark King (born 6 June 1988) is an English former professional footballer. He had previously been signed on non-contract terms at Northwich Victoria F.C. after being released by Accrington Stanley at the end of the 2007–2008 season, however he left Northwich in September 2008.

response: Mark King is the name of:
*Mark King (musician) (born 1958), singer and bass guitar player with Level 42
